folder: Altamount Street & Beacon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1) Altamount Street, west side, between Beacon Avenue and Kildare Street, showing the New Dorp Lighthouse. The beacon is about 150 feet back of the street.

1924

P. L. Sperr

(2) The same, another view.

1924

P. L. Sperr

(3) An additional view.

1924

P. L. Sperr
